featured.name: Universal Epic Universe
featured.description: Universal's newest and most ambitious theme park featuring five immersive worlds including Super Nintendo World, the Wizarding World's Ministry of Magic, and Dark Universe.

featured.name: Six Flags Qiddiya City
featured.description: Home to 5 world records including the world's tallest, fastest, and longest roller coaster - Falcon's Flight at 640ft and 155mph.

featured.name: Phantasialand
featured.description: Germany's hidden gem featuring world-class theming that rivals Disney, with unique attractions like F.L.Y. (world's first launched flying coaster) and Taron.

featured.name: Beto Carrero World
featured.address: Rodovia Beto Carrero, Penha, SC, 88385-000, Brazil
featured.description: Latin America's largest theme park spanning 14 km² with seven themed areas including Madagascar, Hot Wheels, and traditional Brazilian attractions.

north-america.name: North America
north-america.description: Home to the world's most famous theme parks including Walt Disney World, Universal Orlando, and dozens of regional favorites.

europe.name: Europe
europe.description: Discover incredible theming at parks like Phantasialand, Europa-Park, and Disneyland Paris.

asia.name: Asia
asia.description: Experience cutting-edge attractions in Japan, South Korea, and China's rapidly growing theme park industry.

south-america.name: South America
south-america.description: Explore Latin America's largest parks including Beto Carrero World in Brazil.

middle-east.name: Middle East
middle-east.description: The world's newest theme park frontier with record-breaking attractions in Saudi Arabia and UAE.
